custom-sql.sql: SELECT userid FROM public.gfbio_researchobject_user WHERE usertype ='owner' AND researchobjectid = ? AND researchobjectversion = ?

SELECT * FROM gfbio_researchobject WHERE (researchobjectid, researchobjectversion) in ( SELECT researchobjectid, researchobjectversion FROM (SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM public.gfbio_researchobject_user WHERE gfbio_researchobject_user.userid = ?)AS iq WHERE pos=1 )
